name: K-Bot
description:
This game is the end-year project of our second year over a span of 2 month and was created by a team of 9 people. 4 Devolopers and 5 Graphist Designers.

Controls : Credits :
  • Mélodie Laurisson : Lead Producer, UI Designer, Ressource Management
  • Florentin Roberge : Lead Dev, Developer, Level Designer, Game Designer 
  • Jules Francioni : 3D Graphist Designer, Environnement Designer, Ressource Management
  • Aurelien Pecatte : Developer, VFX artist, Level Designer
  • Sylvain Brunet : 3D Graphist Designer, 3D Animator
  • Vianney Rousselot : Developer, Game Designer, UI Designer, SFX Integrator
  • Lazare Viennot : 3D Designer, Scenarist, Concept Artist, Environnement Designer
  • Clovis Michaud : Devoloper, VFX Designer, 
  • Mathieu Giarrusso : Sound designer, 2D Designer, Concept Artist, Scenarist
